company.renshu: Talent Digital Development Co., Ltd, Fujian

ability.p0: [Language] Certificated CET-6, won several competitions during college and is able to use English as a working language.
ability.p1: [Tech] 2 years dev experience on vue/nuxt, knowns the fundamentals of it, and I have the ability to build SEO friendly, multi platform compatible, and interactive website pages based on design drafts.
ability.p2: [Tech] 2 years dev experience on Java & half year dev experience on .NET core for backend development.
ability.p3: [Tech] Have the knowledge about distributed system, service registration and discovery, remote call, traffic breaker, distributed lock, message queue, cache etc.
ability.p4: [Tech] Have basic knowledge of databases, such as transactions, rollback, table locking, query optimization, index optimization, and can use MySQL and redis.
ability.p5: [Tech] My backend development skills have made me very familiar with the RESTful API, thus I am able to efficiently cooperate with backend developers to solve problems.

p7.seg0: [Tech] Have some understanding of cross platform mobile development, have used Flutter / uniapp in personal or previous company projects, and have learned Android native development
p7.seg1: To deepen understanding of cross platform development.

ability.p8: [Footprints of open source] participating in open source community projects with passion and providing assistance to the best of my ability, I am currently maintaining the following projects.
